com.netflix.genie.server.metrics

Interface JobCountManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobCountManagerImpl

    public interface JobCountManager
    Utility class to get number of jobs running on this instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getIdleInstance(long minJobThreshold)
      Returns the most idle Genie instance (< minJobThreshold running jobs), if possible - else returns current instance.
      int getNumInstanceJobs()
      Get number of running jobs running on this instance.
      int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.Long minStartTime, java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
      Get number of running jobs with minStartTime < startTime > maxStartTime on this instance min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.
      int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.String hostName, java.lang.Long minStartTime, java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
      Get number of running jobs with minStartTime <= startTime < maxStartTime min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumInstanceJobs

        int getNumInstanceJobs()
                throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Get number of running jobs running on this instance.
        Returns:
        number of running jobs on this instance
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if there is an error

      • getNumInstanceJobs

        int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.Long minStartTime,
                       java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
                throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Get number of running jobs with minStartTime < startTime > maxStartTime on this instance min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.
        Parameters:
        minStartTime - min start time in ms
        maxStartTime - max start time in ms
        Returns:
        number of running jobs between the specified times
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if there is an error

      • getNumInstanceJobs

        int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.String hostName,
                       java.lang.Long minStartTime,
                       java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
                throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Get number of running jobs with minStartTime <= startTime < maxStartTime min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.
        Parameters:
        hostName - - if null, local host name is used
        minStartTime - min start time in ms
        maxStartTime - max start time in ms
        Returns:
        number of running jobs matching specified criteria
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if there is an error

      • getIdleInstance

        java.lang.String getIdleInstance(long minJobThreshold)
                          throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Returns the most idle Genie instance (< minJobThreshold running jobs), if possible - else returns current instance.
        Parameters:
        minJobThreshold - the threshold to use to look for idle instances
        Returns:
        host name of most idle Genie instance
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if there is any error
